045fcf7a-0e29-4f29-a6b3-f1be825832ed.content:
This is a note, by the way.

Change the color of an element or note by right clicking on it. You can also add an image or icon as cover!

0d580890-add4-4750-9b0c-64a9be4bd9be.content: Create connections between elements by clicking and dragging near their perimeter. Add labels to connections by double clicking on them.

149eee35-d5c7-4a82-9799-ca11215d3f89.content: Click on the Play Mode button on the top menu to run the story!

27bcf38e-cef9-4413-b4c9-97e6c7300ec3.content:
Use arcscript code segments inside elements and labels, to set variables or conditionally display content.

Click the formatting bar's < > icon or press Ctr/Cmd+Shift+C to create a segment.

3beee4a2-1846-4d66-9259-4d05f4b4a450.content:
Attach audio assets to elements by dragging and dropping them from the sidebar's Assets list.

Click on the attached audio asset for more options!

4a702d8d-fa35-432d-b49d-41ed5067bdef.content:
Use the visits() function to check how many times the player has visited an element.

To add an element title as argument, start by typing @the...

Use visits() without an argument if you are inside an element and mean that same element.

585c89a5-a16c-44db-9346-6e2725afcd88.content: You can reference components and boards by @mentioning them. (The text in orange in the title below is a referenced component.

5f45b936-1a0f-4834-87c3-579fb72329b1.content: The element below has a star by its title. This means it is the project's starting element.

a023e2ed-18e3-4bfa-b818-c17b27fa882c.content: Use the show() function to display one or more values (separated by commas).

c917680a-9884-41fb-832c-7ac41f87c520.content: Attach components to elements by dragging and dropping them from the Components list on the sidebar.

ccd54214-e714-45ab-b0ea-f5f906e97352.content:
A branch diverts the narrative flow according to its conditions.

A branch must have an if condition. It can also have an else, as well as several elseif conditions.

e31f8c73-9d3a-43f2-a009-04a569b1c06b.content:
Image Credits
Images by Rachel Chen

Audio Credits
Ancestral Whispers by geoneo0 on Freesound.org
Body Falling by Neospica on Freesound.org
Water Dripping by Sclolex on Freesound.org
Birds in the forest by straget on Freesound.org

e9f8905d-3f74-4480-9816-de7269b2ab8f.content:
Welcome to Arcweave!

Double click on an empty spot in this board (this workspace) to create an element. To edit it, double click on its title or content.

eda3ed5a-bdd5-4981-a72f-c7847630310a.content:
Links to elements are called jumpers.

To create a jumper, drag an element from the sidebar into the board or copy it and "paste it as jumper" with Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + V.

de.text: Schloss Innenhof

en.text: You reach a wooden door. In front of you stands a strange man dressed as a medieval crusader.

de.text: Du erreichst eine Holztür. Vor dir steht ein seltsamer Mann, gekleidet wie ein mittelalterlicher Kreuzritter.

en.text: Exit Castle Monsignor

de.text: Schloss Monsignor verlassen

el.text: Βγες από το Καστρο Μονσινιορ

de.text: Mit dem Mann sprechen

en.text: Outside Castle Monsignor

el.text: Εξω από το Καστρο Μονσινιορ

en.text:
You have just arrived at Castle Monsignor, your uncle's home for the past 20 years. The tone of his letter was desperate, urgently asking for your help. Worried, you quickly packed your suitcase and took the first plane.

Faint bird sounds break the eerie silence and a pale mist engulfs the castle hill.

To the north you can see the castle entrance.

de.text:
Du bist gerade auf Schloss Monsignor angekommen, dem Zuhause deines Onkels seit nunmehr 20 Jahren. Der Ton seines Briefes war verzweifelt und bat dich dringend um Hilfe. Besorgt hast du hastig deinen Koffer gepackt und den nächsten Flug genommen.

Leise Vogelrufe durchbrechen die unheimliche Stille und ein blasser Nebel hüllt den Schlosshügel ein.

Im Norden kannst du den Eingang des Schlosses sehen.

el.text:
Μόλις έφτασες στο Καστρο Μονσινιορ, το σπίτι του θείου σου τα τελευταία 20 χρόνια. Ο τόνος του γράμματός του ήταν απελπισμένος, ζητώντας επειγόντως τη βοήθειά σου. Ανησυχώντας, έσυρες γρήγορα την βαλίτσα σου και πήρες το πρώτο αεροπλάνο.

Αχνές φωνές πουλιών διακόπτουν τη δυσοίωνη σιωπή και μια ωχρή ομίχλη σκεπάζει τον λόφο του κάστρου.

Προς τα βόρεια βλέπεις την είσοδο του κάστρου.

en.text:
"Wrong!" he shouts. Before you can utter another word he strikes you with the back of his sword hilt.

Everything fades to black...
Alas, you did not manage to find what lies behind the ominous door...
Castle Courtyard

de.text: Schloss Innenhof

en.text:
You stand inside a small courtyard. Everything is unusually silent here.

The path leads further to the north. An abandoned house lies to your left.

de.text:
Du stehst in einem kleinen Innenhof. Alles ist hier ungewöhnlich still.

Der Weg führt weiter nach Norden. Ein verlassenes Haus liegt zu deiner Linken.

el.text:
Στέκεσαι μέσα σε μια μικρή αυλή. Όλα εδώ είναι ασυνήθιστα ήσυχα.

Το μονοπάτι συνεχίζει προς τα βόρεια. Ένα εγκαταλελειμμένο σπίτι βρίσκεται στα αριστερά σου.

en.text:
The interior looks more like an artist's studio than a house. A few abstract paintings lie scattered around.

One of the paintings depicts a strange figure: a knight dressed in white, with a red cross on his chest.

de.text:
Das Innere wirkt eher wie ein Atelier als wie ein Haus. Einige abstrakte Gemälde liegen verstreut herum.

Eines der Gemälde zeigt eine seltsame Gestalt: einen Ritter in Weiß, mit einem roten Kreuz auf der Brust.

el.text:
Το εσωτερικό μοιάζει περισσότερο με ατελιέ καλλιτέχνη παρά με σπίτι. Μερικοί αφηρημένοι πίνακες είναι σκορπισμένοι γύρω.

Ένας από τους πίνακες απεικονίζει μια παράξενη μορφή: έναν ιππότη ντυμένο στα λευκά, με έναν κόκκινο σταυρό στο στήθος.

en.text:
As you try to run past him, he swiftly grabs you by the neck. You fight for freedom but his grip is inhumanly strong.

You drift into unconsciousness...

de.text: Kreuzfahrer
Dem Pfad nach Norden folgen

en.text: Back to Castle Courtyard

de.text: Zurück zum Schloss Monsignor

en.text: Back to Castle Courtyard

de.text: Zurück zum Schloss Innenhof

en.text: A stone passage. The sound of dripping water is echoing in the distance. You feel uneasy.

de.text: Ein steinerner Gang. Das Tropfen von Wasser hallt in der Ferne wider. Du fühlst dich unbehaglich.
Schloss Monsignor
Einen Schritt vom Gemälde zurücktreten
Dem Weg weiter folgen

en.text:
The knight is guarding a mysterious gate. You see a name written above his head:

"Conrad IV, Count of Exeter"

if visits(the_crusader)

He looks just like the crusader you saw guarding the door!

endif
if visits() == 1

You make a mental note of the knight's name.

score += 2

(Your score just went up 2 points. You now have a score of

show(score, ".)")
endif

de.text:
Der Ritter bewacht ein geheimnisvolles Tor. Über seinem Kopf siehst du einen Namen stehen:

„Conrad IV., Graf von Exeter“

if visits(the_crusader)

Er sieht genau aus wie der Kreuzritter, den du zuvor am Tor gesehen hast!

endif
if visits() == 1

Du merkst dir den Namen des Ritters.

score += 2

(Dein Punktestand ist gerade um 2 Punkte gestiegen. Du hast nun eine Punktzahl von

show(score, ".)")
endif

en.text:
Congrats, you finished the example project! 🎉Now try and make your own interactive experience. If you need help check the docs, our Youtube tutorials or ping us on Discord!

Happy creations! 😊

de.text: Schloss Monsignor betreten
Zurück zum steinernen Gang

en.text:
Examine the painting

if visits(examine_the_painting)

one more time

endif

de.text:
Das Gemälde untersuchen

if visits(examine_the_painting)

noch einmal

endif

el.text:
Εξέτασε τον πίνακα

if visits(examine_the_painting)

ακόμα μια φορά

endif

en.text:
At once, you utter the name you remember from the painting. In the blink of an eye, the Crusader disappears... Almost as if he were never there.

Weird.

score += 3

(Your score just went up 3 points. You now have a score of

show(score, ".)")
"Only he who knows my name shall pass," he hisses.
The man looks at you suspiciously and tightens his sword grip. He speaks in a deep voice: "What do you want stranger?"

de.text: Das Haus eintreten

value.data: Castle Monsignor is where the game plot and narrative take place. It was built in 1562 near Devonshire, England. The Castle is home to Lord Monsignor, the player's uncle, who has been living there for the past 20 years. The castle has recently become a time traveling portal, allowing people from the 16th century to travel to the present.
The courtyard of Castle Monsignor
Telling him his real name, which can be found on a painting inside the small house
The Crusader exists as an early obstacle to the player, introducing an atmosphere of danger and anachronism throughout the game

5caff231-4102-41f0-8eb6-755d48660fb7.script: visits(examine_the_painting)
